ruleBookInfo.author: author<js>var 斯=['trim','replace'];(function(文,参){var 夏=function(希){while(--希){文['push'](文['shift']());}};夏(++参);}(斯,0x12e));var 文=function(艾,藤){艾=艾-0x0;var 参=斯[艾];return 参;};String(result)[文('0x1')](/\S+[:：]/,'')[文('0x0')]();</js>
ruleBookInfo.coverUrl: cover<js>var 天=['replace'];(function(松,颜){var 歌=function(年){while(--年){松['push'](松['shift']());}};歌(++颜);}(天,0x1ad));var 松=function(川,夏){川=川-0x0;var 颜=天[川];return 颜;};String(result)[松('0x0')](/.*nocover.*/,'');</js>
ruleBookInfo.init:
<js>
var J = org.jsoup.Jsoup.parse(result);
var og = (selector) =>
  J.select('[property="og:' + selector + '"]').attr('content');

var book = {
  name: og('novel:book_name'),
  author: og('novel:author'),
  kind: og('novel:category') + ',' + og('novel:status'),
  latest: og('novel:latest_chapter_name') + ' ' + String(og('novel:update_time')).replace(/(\d+-\d+-\d+).*/, '$1').replace(new RegExp('(·s*)?([^\\d-])?(\\d{2})?'+String(new Date().getFullYear()).slice(-2)+'-'),'$1$2'),
  cover: og('image'),
  intro: J.select('#intro p').eq(0).html(),
};

book;
</js>
ruleBookInfo.intro: intro<js>var 安=['replace','$1\x0a'];(function(蝉,参){var 南=function(景){while(--景){蝉['push'](蝉['shift']());}};南(++参);}(安,0x1aa));var 蝉=function(竹,蓝){竹=竹-0x0;var 参=安[竹];return 参;};String(result)[蝉('0x0')](/<\/?p>/g,'\x0a')['replace'](/(？|[…]+)/g,蝉('0x1'))[蝉('0x0')](/[\t\n]+/g,'\x0a')[蝉('0x0')](/^/,'\x0a');</js>
ruleBookInfo.name: name<js>var 蓉=['replace','trim'];(function(藤,望){var 雨=function(华){while(--华){藤['push'](藤['shift']());}};雨(++望);}(蓉,0xea));var 藤=function(草,露){草=草-0x0;var 望=蓉[草];return 望;};String(result)[藤('0x0')](/(免费)?阅读全文|TXT下载.*|^\s*《|》\s*$/gi,'')[藤('0x1')]();</js>

ruleContent.content:
#content p@text||#content@textNodesvar 青=['split','trim','replace'];(function(遥,灵){var 盐=function(石){while(--石){遥['push'](遥['shift']());}};盐(++灵);}(青,0x9b));var 遥=function(灵,盐){灵=灵-0x0;var 夏=青[灵];return 夏;};String(result)[遥('0x0')](/本章未完.*/,'')[遥('0x1')](/[ \s]* +[ \s]*|\s*
\s*/)['map'](function(灵,盐){return 灵=灵[遥('0x2')]()['replace'](/^ps\d*[:：]/gi,''),0x0===盐&&(灵=灵[遥('0x0')](/^第\S{1,7}[章|卷]\s*[^\{\(（［【]{1,32}$/,'')),灵;})['join']('\x0a');

ruleToc.chapterName: text<js>var 蓉=['trim'];(function(歌,雅){var 成=function(采){while(--采){歌['push'](歌['shift']());}};成(++雅);}(蓉,0x14c));var 歌=function(藤,葵){藤=藤-0x0;var 雅=蓉[藤];return 雅;};String(result)['replace'](/^\s*[更最]新\S{0,2}[：:\s]\s*|[\(（].*?[求更谢乐发推].*?[）\)]/g,'')['replace'](/第\S+[卷部]\s*[^第]*(第)/g,'$1')[歌('0x0')]();</js>
